pkgmetadata.longdescription: To achieve these goals OMFIT adopts a bottom-up collaborative development approach.For more info and tutorials visit the OMFIT `documentation website <https://omfit.io>`_ .The OMFIT source code is maintained as a `GitHub repository <https://github.com/gafusion/OMFIT-source>`_ .Fill out the OMFIT users agreement `OMFIT users agreement form <http://form.omfit.io>`_ to be added to the GitHub repository or the mailing list.The GitHub `issue tracking system <https://github.com/gafusion/OMFIT-source/issues?state=open>`_ is the best way to file bug reports and make feature requests.OMFIT users and developers are welcome to join the OMFIT `DISCORD server <https://discord.gg/ARDn3qD7CE>`_.
